ai-tha-ap130:1.1_0: “The Himalayas are falling from the Himalayas,
ai-tha-ap130:1.2_0: I stay in a mountain cleft.
ai-tha-ap130:3.2_0: Homage to you, supreme among men!
ai-tha-ap130:3.3_0: you have no knowledge about them.
ai-tha-ap130:3.4_0: in all the modes of knowledge.
ai-tha-ap130:4.2_0: I’ll rejoice in heaven for an eon.’
ai-tha-ap130:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap130:5.4_0: this is the perception of fruit.
ai-tha-ap130:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vibhaṅga.
ai-tha-ap130:9.1_0: the eighth knowledges for the Elder Nun Past.
